sentences.english: The board thus far has supported the 62-year-old Mr.
sentences.chinese: 美國銀行董事會目前仍然支持現年62歲的劉易斯。

sentences.english: Sihanouk, now 88 and the king father, resides in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 現年88歲的西哈努克國王仍居住在北京。

sentences.english: The suspect, Gong Runbo, 33, grew up in the town.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪嫌疑人宮潤伯現年33歲，本地人。

sentences.english: Li Chang, 53, was suspended pending an investigation.
sentences.chinese: 據瞭解，現年53歲的李昶停職後將面臨調查。

sentences.english: He was 15 years old. Now 31, Phelps still holds three world records.
sentences.chinese: 現年31歲的菲爾普斯仍保持着三項世界記錄。

sentences.english: The 32-year-old is working for French TV station M6.
sentences.chinese: 特里奧現年32歲，在法國M6電視臺工作。

sentences.english: Rajaratnam, 53, now faces 20 years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 現年53歲的拉賈拉特南將面臨20年監禁。

sentences.english: Sam, aged six, is just one of around 60 people in Britain with congenital central hypoventilation syndrome (CCHS), which means he often stops breathing.
sentences.chinese: 現年6歲的Sam患有先天中樞性換氣不足症候羣。

sentences.english: Ms. Gibbons, 54, has been in jail since Sunday, and Mr.
sentences.chinese: 現年54歲的吉布思女士，自週日開始入獄。

sentences.english: Mr. Gann was born in Lufkin Texas and is thirty-one years of age.
sentences.chinese: 江恩先生出生於德克薩斯州的盧浮金，現年31歲。

sentences.english: Mr. Clark, 24 years old, wasn't arrested, and no charges were filed.
sentences.chinese: 現年24歲的克拉克並未遭到逮捕也沒有受到指控。

sentences.english: So little Nello, who was now six years old, took his place and carried the milk.
sentences.chinese: 所以現年六歲的小尼洛便取代他來運送牛奶。

sentences.english: Ms. Tanaka is a 57-year-old politician from Niigata prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 田中真紀子現年57歲，出生在新瀉縣。

sentences.english: “Al Gore ruined my life, ” Mr. Hardy, who is now 61, likes to say.
sentences.chinese: “阿爾毀了我的生活，”現年61歲的哈代先生說。

sentences.english: Now 42, Mr. Jaffe helps others through midlife transitions.
sentences.chinese: 現年42歲的加夫幫助其他人度過中年時期的轉變。
